input.newString:
# Environment variables
# Add your environment variables here

# Translation Service - Required for the DeepL clone
DASHSCOPE_API_KEY=sk-ad9404d1ced5426082b73e685a95ffa3

# Neon Database - Required for user authentication and data persistence
DATABASE_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_6s2VMobPfUaZ@ep-patient-rain-ag0k2kh0-pooler.c-2.eu-central-1.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require&channel_binding=require"
DIRECT_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_6s2VMobPfUaZ@ep-patient-rain-ag0k2kh0-pooler.c-2.eu-central-1.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require&channel_binding=require"

# Auth.js - Required for user authentication
NEXTAUTH_SECRET="your-secret-key-here-replace-with-generated-key"
NEXTAUTH_URL="http://localhost:3000"

# OAuth Providers (Optional - for social login)
# GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID="your-google-client-id"
# GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET="your-google-client-secret"
# GITHUB_CLIENT_ID="your-github-client-id"
# GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET="your-github-client-secret"

metadata.diff:
Index: /home/user/project/.env
===================================================================
--- /home/user/project/.env
+++ /home/user/project/.env
@@ -3,8 +3,17 @@
 
 # Translation Service - Required for the DeepL clone
 DASHSCOPE_API_KEY=sk-ad9404d1ced5426082b73e685a95ffa3
 
-# Database (Optional - not used in current DeepL clone)
-DATABASE_URL=
-NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=
-NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=
\ No newline at end of file
+# Neon Database - Required for user authentication and data persistence
+DATABASE_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_6s2VMobPfUaZ@ep-patient-rain-ag0k2kh0-pooler.c-2.eu-central-1.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require&channel_binding=require"
+DIRECT_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_6s2VMobPfUaZ@ep-patient-rain-ag0k2kh0-pooler.c-2.eu-central-1.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require&channel_binding=require"
+
+# Auth.js - Required for user authentication
+NEXTAUTH_SECRET="your-secret-key-here-replace-with-generated-key"
+NEXTAUTH_URL="http://localhost:3000"
+
+# OAuth Providers (Optional - for social login)
+# GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID="your-google-client-id"
+# GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET="your-google-client-secret"
+# GITHUB_CLIENT_ID="your-github-client-id"
+# GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET="your-github-client-secret"
\ No newline at end of file
